lang.continue_game: Place the prize and continue the game.
lang.dispute_process: The dispute will be closed on the contract through NUM blocks.
lang.dispute_resolve: The dispute will be settled on a smart contract.
lang.dispute_close: The dispute will soon be closed.
lang.save_prize: Save the profit and finish the game.
lang.sending_dispute: The dispute is open. Wait for the resolution of the dispute.
lang.set_bet: Select a bet SPL for the current game.
lang.set_deposit: Select the amount of BET SPL you are ready to play.
lang.error_balance_bet: You do not have enough BET.
lang.error_balance_eth: You do not have enough ETH.
lang.error_balance_bankroll_bet: Bankroll do not have enough BET. Try to choose a deposit less.
lang.error_quick_return: The previous session of the game is not closed. Try later (NUM min).
lang.invalid_signature_bankroll: Bankroll did not sign the current event. We sent the dispute to smart contract ADR.
lang.tutor_1: Hello! Choose your deposit and click ACCEPT.
lang.tutor_2: Now select a bet for one game.
lang.tutor_4: It is a pity that you lost, but you can play a new game.
lang.tutor_5: Make a decision and select the button.
